Uses of Package
tilt.image.page

  • Packages that use tilt.image.page 
    Package Description
    tilt.handler
    These classes handle the various types of REST request (PUT,DELETE,GET,POST) and also specific services, such as returning images referred to on HTMLpages (TiltImageHandler) and GeoJson (GeoJsonHandler).
    tilt.image
    This package handles everything directly related to the manipulation of images, and preparing them for text-to-image linking.
    tilt.image.page
    The purpose of this package is to represent the visually identified parts of the page: the lines and word-shapes.
  • Classes in tilt.image.page used by tilt.handler 
    Class and Description
    Word
    Maintain word-related information
  • Classes in tilt.image.page used by tilt.image 
    Class and Description
    Page
    Represent a collection of lines already recognised on a page
  • Classes in tilt.image.page used by tilt.image.page 
    Class and Description
    Line
    Represent a discovered line in an image
    Word
    Maintain word-related information
